findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: The controlling authorities can change critical state variables to gain additional profit, which is unfair to other users.

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: The Solidity compiler versions specified in the smart contracts were outdated and should be updated to the latest stable version for best practice.

findings.title: Improper Function Visibility
findings.description: Public functions that are never called internally by the contract itself should have external visibility.
